sourcesContent:
import { OrbitControls } from '@react-three/drei'
import { useHelper } from '@react-three/drei'
import Sphere from './Sphere'
import Floor from './Floor'
import { useRef } from 'react'
import { DirectionalLightHelper, HemisphereLightHelper, SpotLightHelper, RectAreaLight} from 'three'

export default function Experience() {
   
    const directionalLightRef = useRef()
    const hemisphereLightHelper = useRef()
    const spotLightHelper = useRef()
    const rectAreaLight = useRef()

    useHelper(directionalLightRef, DirectionalLightHelper, 1, "yellow")
    useHelper(hemisphereLightHelper, HemisphereLightHelper, 0.5,"red")
    useHelper(spotLightHelper, SpotLightHelper, 100)
    useHelper(rectAreaLight, RectAreaLight,2,10)

    return <>
        <OrbitControls makeDefault/>

        <directionalLight  ref={rectAreaLight} castShadow={true} position={[0, 3, -5]} intensity={1.5} shadow-mapSize={ [ 1024, 1024 ] }/>
        <ambientLight intensity={0.3} />

        <Sphere/>
        <Floor/>
    </>
}
